mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Tyler, John, 1790-1862
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Letter concerning his studies, mentions marriage of Albert; mentions Mr. Preston, senator of S. Carolina, son of General Preston of Va., and great nephew of Patrick henry, speaking before the Senate. 2 pages. Autograph Letter Signed. Including Typewritten Copy of the above Autograph Letter Signed.
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1834 January 26, John Tyler, Washington, D.C. to his son Robert Tyler, Williamsburg, Virginia
